broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.short_description: Percent of households self-reported to have a broadband internet connection (any type of internet other than a dial-up)
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.long_description: Percent of households self-reported to have a broadband internet connection. Broadband internet is defined as any type of internet other than a dial-up. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.statement: {value} of the households in {features.name} has a broadband connection.

broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.short_name: Households with cable, fiber optic, or DSL
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.long_name: Percent of households with a high speed internet service (cable, fiber optic, or DSL)
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.short_description: Percent of households self-reported to have a high speed internet service (cable, fiber optic, or DSL)
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.long_description: Percent of households self-reported to have a high speed internet service. A high speed internet service is defined as a cable, fiber optic, or DSL internet connection. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.statement: {value} of the households in {features.name} has a cable fiber or DSL internet connection.

broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.long_name: Percent of households without a computer
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.short_description: Percent of the households self-reported to not have a computer or device at home
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.long_description: Percent of the households self-reported to not have a computer or device at home. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.statement: {value} of the households in {features.name} have a computer or device.

broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.long_name: Percent of households without internet access
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.short_description: Percent of households self-reported to not have internet access at home
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.long_description: Percent of households self-reported to not have internet access at home. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
broadband_withoutint_compdev:perc_hh_wit.statement: {value} of the households in {features.name} have not internet access.
